formattedAddress: 5 E 98th St 14th Fl, Box 1259, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 5 E 98th St 14th Fl, Box 1259, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text:
I was told by my gastroenterologist that I had a complicated problem that needed immediate attention. He recommended Dr. Edward Chin. After consulting my many contacts and Doctors at Mt Sinai Hospital, I knew I was sent to the best surgeon.
After speaking with Dr. Chin, I was sure I was in the right hands. He quietly and with compassion explained my problems and how he would repair them. He answered all my questions and calmed all my anxieties about the surgery and recovery.
After surgery he met with my sister and told her the results of the procedure. Later in the evening his team stopped by in Post-op to explain everything to me. Early next morning Dr.Chin checked in to see how I was doing and to explain what I went through and what I needed to do to have a full recovery. His team did everything to see that my stay and my release was as easy as possible.
It is now almost 3 weeks after surgery and I know I had the best surgeon at the best hospital. Thank you Dr. Chin

originalText.text: Dr. Chin and his office was amazing! If I had any questions, his office and him always got back to me in a timely manner. From pre-surgery to post surgery it was a great experience. I will definitely go back to him if I need to.

text.text: Dr. Chin and his office was amazing! If I had any questions, his office and him always got back to me in a timely manner. From pre-surgery to post surgery it was a great experience. I will definitely go back to him if I need to.

originalText.text: I had a great experience with the doctor. He took good care of me. The surgery was successful. I’m very happy with the results of the procedure.

text.text: I had a great experience with the doctor. He took good care of me. The surgery was successful. I’m very happy with the results of the procedure.

originalText.text: I would recommend Dr. Edward Chin to all my family & friends. He’s courteous, compassionate and a Great Surgeon !!! Mount Sinai Hospital in my humble opinion is the finest in NYC.

text.text: I would recommend Dr. Edward Chin to all my family & friends. He’s courteous, compassionate and a Great Surgeon !!! Mount Sinai Hospital in my humble opinion is the finest in NYC.

originalText.text: Amazing Doctor made me feel so comfortable from check in that’s right checkin with me the whole time. ❤️❤️and the kindness man, he deserves nothing but the best in his life.
